synopsis.text: Washio Sumi's promise unfolds in the divine era of year 300, where Yuuna Yuuki navigates the mundane world of a typical second-year middle school student alongside her extraordinary life as a 'Hero Club' member. This unique club isn't your average after-school activity, as its mission revolves around confronting an enigmatic entity known as the 'Vertex.' This captivating tale of courage and friendship aired in tandem with the third movie installment of 'Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru: Washio Sumi no Shou' (Source: Anime News Network).
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
